column1: 09:56|Harry found himself standing outside the embassy at 9:33 a.m. Once around the block: 9:43. Once again
column4: across a pebbled courtyard and up a dozen steps
column5: where a large double door was opened for him by a guard whose medals indicated that they had served in the same theater of war.|Best Kept Secret|Jeffrey Archer

column1:
09:56|9:56 A.M.
Ally stepped out of the cab
column3: and checked the number on the card against the bronze plaque above the door. Winston Bartlett lived like a nineteenth‑century robber baron.|Syndrome|Thomas Hoover
